X.i.6.K.2.a
.
References to Participants in the Reserve or National Guard Who Are Not on Active Duty
Any reference in this section to participants in the Reserve or National Guard who are
not
on active duty includes individuals returned to active duty for the sole purpose of participating in IDES.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K - Special Situations Related to Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES)
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K
